entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 24. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 7:55 PM CST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 18.
